name: The Dreamers
description:
You have an extraordinary gift: you can cross at will between the sleeping and the waking world, and see into the dreams of others. Tonight you begin work at the Palace of Mysteries. It will be your job to watch and record the secret thoughts that hide in the city's dreams.

Though set in another place and time with only tenuous connection to our own, this text is inspired by Charlotte Beradt's 'The Third Reich of Dreams'. Cover image is 'La Scala ou Les Yeux' by Maria Helena Vieira da Silva.
